description: Lufa, founded in 2009 by 4 co-founders, is an innovative urban farming initiative based in Montreal that focuses on rooftop farming to enhance food transparency and sustainability.  The initiative aims to grow food where people live, ensuring freshness and sustainability. With five greenhouses, Lufa collaborates with local producers to offer a diverse range of products through an online marketplace, reducing food waste and supporting community engagement while prioritizing ethical and environmentally conscious practices.
name: Lufa Farms
